title: [BUG] NullReferenceException occurs when iOS redraws SKCanvasView view but it had been already disposed
body:
**Description**

Exception has occurred in the moment of back navigation from page with SKCanvasView.


```
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
at SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.SKDrawable.DrawSurface (CoreGraphics.CGContext ctx, CoreGraphics.CGRect viewBounds, SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo info, SkiaSharp.SKSurface surface) <0x104f466f0 + 0x0004c> in <1dff7dabaada4d38b0d12baee26f046c#85a406ab9d3ebec0a9a84dd9b6d8be21>:0 
at SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.SKCanvasView.Draw (CoreGraphics.CGRect rect) <0x104f42990 + 0x002bb> in <1dff7dabaada4d38b0d12baee26f046c#85a406ab9d3ebec0a9a84dd9b6d8be21>:0 
at (wrapper managed-to-native) UIKit.UIApplication.UIApplicationMain(int,string[],intptr,intptr)
at UIKit.UIApplication.Main (System.String[] args, System.IntPtr principal, System.IntPtr delegate) <0x10434de20 + 0x0002b> in <854c6713acc54b0389a597c8b4079500#85a406ab9d3ebec0a9a84dd9b6d8be21>:0 
at UIKit.UIApplication.Main (System.String[] args, System.String principalClassName, System.String delegateClassName) <0x10434dd60 + 0x000ab> in <854c6713acc54b0389a597c8b4079500#85a406ab9d3ebec0a9a84dd9b6d8be21>:0 
at SomeApp.AppDelegate.Main (System.String[] args) <0x102769e20 + 0x0003f> in :0
```


**Root cause**
Using of disposed object.
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.AppleiOS/SKCanvasView.cs

![Screenshot_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31827085/65421156-b8ec2100-de0b-11e9-9582-b7e32b79a541.png)


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.0
- IDE:  Visual Studio 
- Platform Target Frameworks: Xamarin.Touch
  - iOS:  12.2
